title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site. Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services for Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. The park is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating directly to Grant-Kohrs Ranch, you may contact the Superintendent for more information or send donations to:   Jacqueline Lavelle, Superintendent Grant-Kohrs Ranch NHS 266 Warren Lane Deer Lodge, MT 59722 (406) 846-2070 x221
